tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE credit_card_usage (
  card_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  card_holder_name VARCHAR(50),
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  merchant_name VARCHAR(100),
  category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE credit_card_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number TEXT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    merchant_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cardholders (
    cardholder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE credit_score (
    cardholder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    score INTEGER,
    credit_limit DECIMAL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE credit_cards (    card_number INT PRIMARY KEY,    holder_name VARCHAR(50),    card_type VARCHAR(20),    credit_limit DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE transactions (    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,    card_number INT,    transaction_date DATE,    merchant VARCHAR(50),    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE customers (    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,    customer_name VARCHAR(50),    email VARCHAR(50),    phone_number VARCHAR(15),    address VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE risk_assessment (    assessment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,    customer_id INT,    risk_score INT,    assessment_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE credit_cards (
  card_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  card_holder_name VARCHAR(255),
  card_type VARCHAR(50),
  credit_limit DECIMAL(10,2),
  card_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  card_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  merchant_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  customer_email VARCHAR(255),
  customer_address VARCHAR(255),
  customer_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  card_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  risk_score INT,
  risk_category VARCHAR(50)
);
